title: GM 's research and development expenditures 2015 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars, about 7.8 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars about 6.0 was reached at Year 2015
